title: 93/574/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 October 1993 amending Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 October 1993 amending Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community
(93/574/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
(a) In part 1 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC, the following embryo collection team is deleted:
'E71 United Breeders Inc., R.R.5, Guelph, Ontario, N1R 4B6 Dr Ludovit Nechala'
(b) In part 3 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC, the following embryo collection team is added:
'92PA059 E758 Twin Lakes Genetics, RD1, Box 60B, Enon Valley, PA Dr Richard Byers'
This Decision is addressed to Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 October 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 10. 10. 1989, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29.
(3) OJ No L 250, 29. 8. 1992, p. 40.
(4) OJ No L 201, 11. 8. 1993, p. 17.
